title: Amazing Vi Skin Idea Deserves some Recognition!

replies.body: I keep throwing my wallet at the screen, but nothing is happening!

i have an idea for the next 3250 skin it will 

be baker pantheon wearing an apron and 

dealing 1 less damage to feast champs like 

cho and tahm and nunu his r would be him 

jumping on a wedding cake to spring in the 

air and smashing on a pie ,,and his q will be 

him squezzing a twinkie and the cream inside 

will replace the spear going to the enemy 

also his weapon will be a long french bread 

and shield and cookie also his e wil be a 

squirt of frosting in the cone and w will be 

him jumping to the enemy with the animation 

of him smashing the cookie on an enemy head 

making birds chirp instead of the stun normal 

spiral animation and when he kills an enemy 

with his w he will say ''maybe i burnt this 

cookie'' and will have secret taunts to 

champions that eat things such as listed 

above his splash art would be him standing in 

a baking shop named pantheons baking dream 

with him standing behind he shelf with his 

wepons and skills on display such as the 

wedding cake he jumps on and the pie he slams 

on when he lands and his frosting used for 

his e and his box of twinkies for his q hope 

riot enjoys please support my idea my name is 

rafael jackson

We could have a full metal Pilotver theme :D
Full metal Vi, Jayce, Heimer, Cait, and whoever else is from Pilotver!

Full Metal as a series is a contrast to the Battlecast skins. In the (noncanon) story arc, Viktor raises an army to conquer the world, and Jayce, his eternal rival, bands together with some other people to stop him. Jayce, Pantheon, and Rammus are the current FM skins, but they lack a cohesive theme. A theme like FM Jayce would be great for the line.
ALL THE FREAKING YES! RIOT MAKE THIS HAPPEN NOW!!!! YOU HAVE FULL METAL JAYCE MAKE FULL METAL VI NOW!

Here is my suggestion for some effects and added properties:
http://i.imgur.com/jgr98Dp.png

- The helm now has a V-shaped pattern with light. I also tried to make the helm more menacing
- 6 LED lights in a pattern (VI)
- Added lights to give the skin more flair
- The lights blink as part of the VFX
